DOC.brief_summary: Randomized Controlled study compare effectiveness two different treatment approach use new moldable beta-tricalcium phosphate ( TCP ) bone graft material ridge preservation atraumatic extraction socket site compare allograft collagen plug .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Ridge Preservation Using Moldable Beta-tricalcium Phosphate Bone Grafting System
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent At least 18 year old In need one posterior tooth , exclude third molar molar , plan extraction replacement dental implant ( If subject require two adjacent socket preservation , still enrol study one site use study ) Intact ridge verify conebeam CT scan At least one natural tooth adjacent study site present . Insufficient interocclusal space allow implant support prosthesis Dehiscence fenestration identify time review CBCT . Nontreated caries uncontrolled periodontal disease present affect teeth adjacent study teeth . Any natural teeth adjacent study site present active periapical endodontic lesion ( `` active periapical endodontic lesion '' determine per consultation endodontics specialist ) . Adjacent tooth ( mesial distal ) study site extract within last 6 month Adjacent teeth ( tooth ) study site significant soft tissue loss Smoker use 10 cigarette equivalent per day Smokeless tobacco use ecigarette use Current alcohol drug abuser Systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration e.g . uncontrolled diabetes Need systemic corticosteroid medication would influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration Pregnancy , indicate positive serum human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) test result . Unable unwilling return followup visit period 5 month Unlikely able comply study procedure accord Investigators judgement Subject clinical trial
